The candidate will be required to roll up his/her sleeves and get hands on when necessary.   We need someone who prioritizes well, communicates clearly and compellingly understands how to drive a high level of focus and excellence with a strong team and has a demonstrable track record of success building managing teams and delivering new features or products.
